text:
= Lab PoC

- special components allowed
 - prototypes
 - non- secure
 - with high risk


- WORK-AROUNDS allowed
 - bypass governance
 - manual steps
 - simulated data
 - DUMMY Interfaces

Purpose: SHOWS THAT AND HOW
A TECHNICAL SOLUTION
CAN BE CREATED.
No Statement to
business readynes.



= Field PoC

- generic components prefered
 - GA tools / libs
 - security as in PROD
 - accepted risk levels only

- Gaps: NO WORKAROUND
 - GOVERNANCE NEEDED
 - manual steps ok
 - real data
 - real interfaces

Purpose: Shows that and how a
solution can be integrated into a working solution.
